public: AssemblyIdentity(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ version, System::String ^ publicKeyToken, System::String ^ culture);

param.span: 指定組件的公開金鑰語彙基元，這是用來簽署組件之公開金鑰的 SHA-1 雜湊最後 8 個位元組。

span.span: A blank string indicates the invariant culture.

span.span: The full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

span.span: Returns null if identity could not be obtained.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProcessorArchitecture { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

value.span: 代表組件處理器架構的字串。

span.span: A string representing the processor architecture of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效值為`msil`， `x86`， `ia64`， `amd64`。Valid values are `msil`, `x86`, `ia64`, `amd64`.

span.span: A string indicating the public key token of the assembly.
